name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald WATERS, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald WATERS, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The Judgments of Sentence are affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert P. Paskings (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Victor Fortumo, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
431 A.2d 278
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Donald WATERS, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 29, 1981.
Decided July 10, 1981.
Robert P. Paskings (Court-appointed), Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Victor Fortumo, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
